page.title: 20COMMUNITY CENTRE CONTINUED
page.content: The{Community Centre}has its own bar, social room and all-weather sports pitch in use permanently. It has the use of the school hall and showers from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m. daily and all day at the weekends and school holidays. The school has use of these facilities for 12 sessions a term. The centre is at present used by 11 local clubs and organisations. A{Health {Clinic}is held there twice monthly. 3 days a week it is used as a{Day Care {Recreation Centre}for the elderly. After their morning activities they eat their lunch with the children in the school dining hall. The older children are actively involved in the Day Care Centre during the school day. This liaison, at present unique in the county, benefits both young and old.
